Title: I'm an Old Communist Hag
Writer: Stere Gulea, Vera Ion, Lucian Dan Teodorovici
Actors: Luminita Gheorghiu, Marian Ralea, Ana Ularu, Valeria Seciu
Plot: The story takes place in 2010, in a post-communist Romania, in which some of those who fully lived in the communist period don't seem to fit anymore. The main character and her husband are ...
